item.title: Our store feed has moved!
item.content:encoded:
Hi, everyone! We're very excited to launch our new site. As a result, our RSS feeds have been updated and moved. This feed will no longer be active; please unfollow it and subscribe to the new one here: wearcognition.com/feeds/store-atom.xml.

Thanks!

item.title: Good Luck
item.content:encoded:
You might not believe in luck, but if you do, you can go nuts in this cap.

4-panel, 100% wool with fleece flap.  Hand wash, air dry.

item.title: Lime Stripe
item.content:encoded:
Bright lime green stripe.  For those of us who can’t stop partying. 

4-panel, cotton poly blend with grosgrain stripe. Hand wash, air dry.

item.title: Bonfire
item.content:encoded:
Nothing better than a dark night in the woods with a blazing red and yellow fire to sit around.  This cap captures the colors, but you’re going to have to ride your ass to the woods for the rest.

4-panel, cotton poly blend, Hand wash, air dry.

item.title: Valentine
item.content:encoded:
144 million Valentineâ€™s Day cards are sent every year for a holiday for some Saint that no one knows anything about.  WTF?  I’m getting back on my bike…

4-panel, cotton poly blend, Hand wash, air dry.

item.title: Stealth Stripe
item.content:encoded:
It’s good to fly a little bit under the radar. 

4-panel, cotton poly blend, Hand wash, air dry.

item.title: Reflections
item.content:encoded:
Think about reflection, a chorus of singular hands clapping, and a tree sneezing in the woods with no one around to hear it.  Riding your bike can be like that.

4-panel, cotton poly blend, reflective stripe, Hand wash, air dry.

item.title: Dog Vision
item.content:encoded:
This cap is black and white so you can rest knowing that no matter what your dog will know what it looks like. 

4-panel, cotton poly blend, Upcycled material.  Machine wash, air dry.

item.title: Night Sky Glow
item.content:encoded:
The sun sets and then all of a sudden…BAM!  Those stars were there the whole time, you just couldn’t see them because it was light out!! This cap’s kind of like that.

4-panel, cotton poly blend, Machine wash, air dry.

item.title: Picnic Cap
item.content:encoded:
Pack up your plastic wine glasses and cigars.  We’re going on a picnic. 

6-panel, 100% cotton. Upcycled material. Machine wash, air dry.
